page.title: 17LADIES CLUBS
page.content: {The Forncett & Tacolneston Ladies {Friendship Club approx 35 membership, is non_sectarian & non_political, & meets monthly in the Village Hall. Meetings consist of a talk by an invited speaker on various subjects & is followed by a discussion of club business. Annual fundraising events for charities include a Harvest Supper & a Fashion Show. {Tacolneston WI has 25 members}meeting monthly in the Village Hall _ subjects for speakers are both educational & topical. Each year 2 jumble sales are held to provide funds for the recreation centre & members help at the Summer Fete.They also help to run the{Thursday Club}for retired people. During the year an event is organised for a chosen charity & members under_ take charity collections in the village.
